Articles.Content: I kick every drone between the legs.
Hill gets free for timeout.
I kidnap Hill.
You Fool! That hill was a fake, and is actually 18 sticks of dynamite!
You're all fools! That hill was a mountain! It's king of the hill, not king of the mountain!

Any mountain is a reversed pit. Anti-pit.

Antipit Antiking owns it.
I hack the antiking with my leet skills.
I persistence the anti king out of existence. My unexitinced antiking.

> 
> 
> 1 minute ago, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> I persistence the anti king out of existence. My unexitinced antiking.
> 

You just said that!

I was watching you!
Hi! Want my hill? Only 0.00 cents!

> 
> 
> 2 minutes ago, HansonKerman said:
> 
> 
> Hi! Want my hill? Only 0.00 cents!
> 

Sure! Whats the disclaimer?
Disclaimer: none

In absence of a disclaimer the hill gets claimed.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-05-19T04:51:10Z" title="05/19/2018 04:51  AM" data-short="6 yr">May 19, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**
Yes it does.

No patent hasn’t been made on the hill.

After my patent I now legally own parts of all of your hills.
The patent is a fraud! I file a lawsuit for 40 million dollars!

They deliver to you a suit of a lawyer, but unfortunately it's beat-up old.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-05-22T16:41:56Z" title="05/22/2018 04:41  PM" data-short="6 yr">May 22, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

I use.

My hill.

You haven't published terms of use and license agreement.  

Therefore hereby we declare that the hill (hereinafter referred as The Hill) from now on changes its legal status to common property.
I'm just gonna stay out of this because I don't know one bit about politics. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")
I... veto.. the hill

I claim a hill as my own.

My hill, also open for any allies that help defends it.

(Is it bad I feel a bit tipped seeing how the original game format of: [My action]  [My hill/whatever remains.], hasn't been used much?)

Your hill? HA! ITS MY HILL BECAUSE I HIT YOU UPSIDE THE HEAD WITH MY SPINY ARMS.

my gory hill.

> 
> 
> Quote
> 
> 
> Migori Town (-1.0634,34.4731) is 368 kilometers from Nairobi. Migori town is bordered by hills.
> 

OK, Migori hill.

I place enough dirt on all the hills in the universe to turn them into mountains.

The now hill-less universe.
